OrgName.entry: DEPARTMENT OF HEARING SERVICES - SHEFFIELD TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Provides investigation, management and rehabilitation of hearing disorders, including deafness, tinnitus and balance disorders. Also provides, on GP referral, hearing assessments for people over 60, which leads to hearing aids being issued, counselling, rehabilitation and review. Also provide domiciliary visits for elderly housebound NHS hearing aid users. Has the following direct services available: battery issue, repair, re-assessment of hearing and hearing aids, replacement of ear mould, further counselling and rehabilitation.
